tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T27 at the Florida Qualifying tournament, with a 12-under-276 total...Started the Mackenzie Tour's season at PC Financial Open with four under-par rounds, carding 69 on the scorecard over his final three rounds.
tourBios.personal: Is afraid of sharks...Favorite course he's played is St. Andrews and he hopes to play Augusta National someday. Wants to travel to all of the continents...Big Cincinnati sports fan...Dream foursome would include Justin Timberlake, Charles Barkley and Jay Bilas...Twitter account is @c__mart.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T7th in 2015 at the PC Financial Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T78th in Total Eagles on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
